titleStmt.title: The most famous and tragicall historie of Pelops and Hippodamia Whereunto are adioyned sundrie pleasant deuises, epigrams, songes and sonnettes. Written by Mathewe Groue.
titleStmt.author: Grove, Mathew.
Smith, Richard, fl. 1587.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Abel Ieffs dwelling in the Forestreete without Creeplegate, neere vnto Grubstreete,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The historie of Pelops and Hippodamia.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the Forestreete without Creeplegate, neere vnto Grubstreete
